decoworld.model.world.worlditems

Class DestructibleBoulder

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.world.entities.WorldEntity
      • decoworld.model.world.worlditems.StaticWorldItem
        • decoworld.model.world.worlditems.DestructibleBoulder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasClick, HasCollision, HasMouseOver, HasPhysicsBox, HasLocation, HasRotation, WorldItem, HasItemLabel, HasWorldItemEvent

    public class DestructibleBoulder
extends StaticWorldItem
implements HasPhysicsBox, HasCollision
    Destructible Boulder Class. This item is a boulder designed to block the players advance through the level, yet it is destructible. This object is meant to be able to be collided with, have a health stat and a physics box. When the player hits the boulder, the health will decrement until it is dead.

    Current Functionality: - Takes damage by being run into by the player (easily updatable to take damage from more specific items) - Image changes as the boulder takes damage - Upon full damage, the boulder disappears completely. - Currently doesn't respawn in its place.

    Created by jason on 18/08/14.
